resources.string:
1. Choose from one of the goal celebrations, you can select and test out the celebrations by pressing the play buttons. 

2. Then either turn the on/off button on or turn on the match timer to keep app on for the length full of a match. 

3. Now the next time there is a goal wake up your phone (no need to unlock) then shake it.....goal goal goal GOOOOOOOOOOOAL!!!!!!!
